name: IntelliWare Systems
overview: IntelliWare Systems, Inc. provides trusted advisory services to the United States security domain to transform information into operational and management intelligence. It offers organizational planning and program management services, such as mission architecture, strategic plan and policy development, strategic plan and policy refinement and implementation, program management and funding, program analysis and measurement, enterprise architecture and governance, communications and liaison strategy, and performance management services. The company also offers business architecture and analysis, such as operational concept exploration, process documentation, process re-engineering and new process development, organization optimization and change management, performance metrics and measurement, and communications planning and execution. In addition, it offers technology management services, such as IT program and portfolio, IT project management and governance, planning, design and build, requirements engineering and analysis, systems analysis, prototyping, system evaluation and trade-off analysis, user acceptance testing, training curriculum development, training and support services in the areas of intelligence processing, information management and sharing, and data warehousing. The company serves federal law enforcement and homeland security, intelligence, and defense customers. IntelliWare Systems, Inc. was formerly known as Intel Ware Systems, Inc. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Fredericksburg, Virginia.

relationships.title: Co-Founder and Director of Federal Law Enforcement
